TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发单击控件中的更新按钮时的事件，但之后控件更新记录。The control raises the event when an Update button in the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. (的更新按钮控件是的按钮控件`CommandName`属性设置为"更新"。)每次此事件发生时，例如检查更新操作的结果，您可以执行自定义的例程。(An Update button is a button control whose `CommandName` property is set to "Update".) You can perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an update operation. A对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records that were affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受更新操作的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records that were affected by the update operation, use the property. 若要确定是否发生任何异常，请使用属性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 若要访问已更新记录的键字段值，使用属性。To access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 你可以通过访问原始的非键字段值属性。You can access the original non-key field values by using the property. 你可以通过访问更新的非键字段值属性。You can access the updated non-key field values by using the properties. 默认情况下，控件后更新操作将返回到只读模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 当处理更新操作过程中发生的异常时，您可以保留控件处于编辑模式，通过设置属性`true`。When you handle an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the control in edit mode by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定在更新操作期间是否发生了异常。The following example shows how to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New (affectedRows As Integer, e As Exception)

param.name: affectedRows
param.span: 受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

param.name: e
param.span: 执行更新操作时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that was raised when the update operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use for this parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中包含的对象`e`参数。The object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，是主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

value.span: 受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于通常更新只有一条记录，此属性通常包含值为 0 或 1。Because only one record is typically updated, this property usually contains a value of 0 or 1. 不会引发异常的更新操作期间可能出现错误。An error can occur during the update operation that does not raise an exception. 你可以使用若要确保记录已更新的属性。You can use the property to make sure that a record was updated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以验证已更新某个记录。The following example shows how to use the property to verify that a record was updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 。

span.span: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发了异常，并且你决定在事件处理程序中，设置中处理异常属性`true`。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否则，会再次引发异常控件。Otherwise, the exception is thrown again by the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定在更新操作期间是否发生了异常。The following example shows how to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当更新操作期间引发了异常时，则使用属性以指示是否处理该事件处理程序中的异常。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether you handled the exception in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`，处理且不会再次引发该异常被视为控件。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not thrown again by the control. 如果此属性设置为`false`，再次引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is thrown again. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指示，处理了该异常在事件处理程序。The following example shows how to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作之后 控件是否应该继续处于编辑模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果在完成更新操作之后该控件继续处于编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control will remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件后更新操作将返回到只读模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 若要保留控件处于编辑模式，设置属性`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何保留控件处于编辑模式发生异常时。The following example shows how to keep a control in edit mode when an exception occurs. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，其中包含被更新记录的键字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含已更新记录的键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已更新记录的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问已更新记录的键字段的值。The following example shows how to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的新字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含已更新记录的新字段的名称/值对的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已更新记录新的字段值。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问用于非键字段的更新的记录由用户输入的新值。The following example shows how to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OldValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，其中包含被更新记录的原始键字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含已更新记录的原始字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已更新记录的原始字段值。Use the property to access the original field values for the updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示其原始值的已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record with their original values. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问更新的记录的非键字段的原始值。The following example shows how to access the original values of the non-key fields for the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
